item.title: Formal Notice sent to Gary Gensler, Chair of the U.S. Securities and Echange Commission
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-08_2146_0800_gary_gensler.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: 18 U.S. Code ยง 4 - FORMAL NOTICE: DO NOT IGNORE Date sent: March 08, 2024, 21:46 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Gary Gensler (Chair of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-08_2146_0800_gary_gensler.pdf Dear Mr. Gensler, Please be advised that this communication constitutes a formal notice under 18 U.S. Code ยง 4.
